author: Simon Difford
description: A mint and blackberry Margarita with honey in place of agave syrup and served Julep-style.
name: Blackberry Mint Margarita Julep
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE blackberries in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into cup/glass filled with crushed ice
